snippet.title: Last Time I Saw You - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Last Time I Saw You is a narrative adventure about love and acceptance, with an emphasis on story, exploration and character development. All set in a lush and vibrant world set in 1980s Japan. Follow in Ayumi's footsteps in this exciting tale of self-discovery in which you will face both a terrible curse and your first steps into adulthood.

Who is this girl?
Did she bring the typhoon with her?
Why do I feel this way towards her?
Is this what grown-ups call love?

Coming soon.

- - - - -

Developer: Maboroshi Artworks
Trailer Music by Prod. Riddiman

- - - - -

Wishlist the game on Steam!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1909750
Follow us on Twitter!
https://twitter.com/MaboroshiArt

This trailer was made with early in-game footage and is subject to change. 
May not represent the final product.

www.maboroshiartworks.com
Copyright © 2022 Maboroshi Artworks
